step.html_instructions: At the roundabout, take the 2nd exit and stay on Р-119
At the roundabout, take the 2nd exit and stay on Р-119

Turn left onto Окружная/Р-119
Continue to follow Р-119
Continue straight to stay on ул. Октябрьская

Merge onto а/д Урал/Е30/М5
Continue to follow Е30/М5

Turn right
Destination will be on the left
